summary: Beaten up, bruised, and scared, a young writer hides in a Stockholm apartment, writing the story of its disappeared inhabitants: the flamboyant and charismatic Morgan brothers.
cast: David Dencik|Sverrir Gudnason|David Fukamachi Regnfors|Ruth Vega Fernandez|Boman Oscarsson|Pernilla August|Magnus Krepper|Christopher Wagelin|Jennie Silfverhjelm|Sven Nordin|Andreas Kundler|Maja Embrink|Louise Peterhoff|Staffan Göthe|Lars Green|Hege Schøyen|Frida Röhl|Peter Edding|Susan Vidler|Emelie Garbers|Magnus Roosmann|Amanda Ooms|Peter Carlberg|Peter Bergared|Lars Helander|Rasmus Troedsson|Björn Andrésen|Dag Malmberg|Mia Andersson|Rasmus Bjerg|Anders Beckman|Johan Kylén|Noa Samenius|Ted Lantz|Marianne Engström|Sebastian Sporsén|Gustav Berg|Ann-Sofie Nurmi|Sonja Richter|Peter Gantzler|Klaus Tange|Cate Cammack|Martin Pass|Clifton Anderson|Björn Andersson|Sebastian Aronsson|Tommy Bergström|Ronnie Branting|Christopher Cantillo|Gustav Ejstes|Moussa Fadera|Morten Feldt|John Fernold|Reine Fiske|Kim Franson|Jonas Grumstedt|Mattias Gustavsson|Robert Halvarsson|Johan Holmegard|Hans Hällström|Per Ruskträsk Johansson|Jocke Johnzon|Joel Karlsson|Patrik Kolar|Niklas Korssell|Arturas Kuzmenka|Mattias Landaeus|Rickard Lindquist|Stefan Lundaahl|Jan Martens|Fredrik Olsson|Kalle Petersson|Michael Pretsch|Karmela Rudaite|Påhl Ruin|Mats Sandahl|Martin Sjöstedt|Mattias Ståhl|Antanas Svolkenis|Catharina Taube|Hans Tord|Oskar Tyrén|Sarah Appelberg|David Terence Armstrong|Lise Edman|Per Fenger-Krog|Karin Knutsson|Gloria Ormandlaky|Christian Sandström|Agnes Hargne Wallander
title: Gentlemen
